pre_install: ForEach($file in Get-ChildItem $dir\ -Filter Install_*.bat) {(Get-Content $dir\$file) | ForEach-Object {$_ -replace "regsvr32.exe Xy","regsvr32.exe /s Xy"} | Out-File -Encoding oem $dir\$file}

ForEach($file in Get-ChildItem $dir\ -Filter Uninstall_*.bat) {(Get-Content $dir\$file) | ForEach-Object {$_ -replace "regsvr32.exe /u Xy","regsvr32.exe /u /s Xy"} | Out-File -Encoding oem $dir\$file}
